title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

g''(x)=0 at x=0.129458 and x=0.222734 The graph of g is concave down on (0.1295, 0.2227) because g''(x)<0 on this interval.
descriptions:

1 point is earned for the justification

g''(x)=0 at x=0.129458 and x=0.222734

The graph of g is concave down on (0.1295, 0.2227) because g''(x)<0 on this interval.
